verses.text: \w My|strong="H0518"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thou \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w surety|strong="H6148"\w* \w for|strong="H0518"\w* thy \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*, thou hast engaged fast thy \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* stranger.

Thou art \w ensnared|strong="H3369"\w* \w with|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H3920"\w* \w words|strong="H0561"\w* \w of|strong="H6310"\w* thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w caught|strong="H3920"\w* \w with|strong="H6310"\w* thy own \w words|strong="H0561"\w*.

\w Do|strong="H6213"\w* \w therefore|strong="H3588"\w*, \w my|strong="H0935"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w what|strong="H2063"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* say, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* thyself: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* thou art \w fallen|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy neighbour. \w Run|strong="H5337"\w* \w about|strong="H0935"\w*, \w make|strong="H6213"\w* haste, stir \w up|strong="H0935"\w* thy \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*:

\w Give|strong="H5414"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w neither|strong="H0408"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w eyelids|strong="H6079"\w* \w slumber|strong="H8572"\w*.

\w Deliver|strong="H5337"\w* thyself \w as|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3027"\w* doe \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w as|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3027"\w* \w bird|strong="H6833"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w fowler|strong="H3353"\w*.

Go \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w ant|strong="H5244"\w*, O \w sluggard|strong="H6102"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w consider|strong="H7200"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* learn \w wisdom|strong="H2449"\w*:

\w Which|strong="H0834"\w*, \w although|strong="H0834"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w no|strong="H0369"\w* guide, \w nor|strong="H0369"\w* \w master|strong="H4910"\w*, \w nor|strong="H0369"\w* captain,

Provideth \w her|strong="H3559"\w* meat \w for|strong="H3899"\w* herself \w in|strong="H3899"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* \w summer|strong="H7019"\w*, \w and|strong="H3899"\w* gathereth \w her|strong="H3559"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* \w in|strong="H3899"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*.

\w How|strong="H4970"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* wilt thou \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w*, \w O|strong="H4970"\w* \w sluggard|strong="H6102"\w*? \w when|strong="H4970"\w* wilt thou \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w out|strong="H6965"\w* \w of|strong="H5704"\w* thy \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w*?

Thou wilt \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w* \w a|strong="H4592"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w*, thou wilt \w slumber|strong="H8572"\w* \w a|strong="H4592"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w*, thou wilt fold thy \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H4592"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w*:

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w want|strong="H4270"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H0935"\w* thee, \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* traveller, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w poverty|strong="H7389"\w* \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w armed|strong="H4043"\w*. \w But|strong="H0376"\w* \w if|strong="H0376"\w* thou \w be|strong="H0376"\w* diligent, thy \w harvest|strong="H0935"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* fountain, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w want|strong="H4270"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w flee|strong="H0935"\w* far \w from|strong="H0935"\w* thee.

\w A|strong="H1980"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H1980"\w* \w is|strong="H0376"\w* \w an|strong="H0376"\w* apostate, \w an|strong="H0376"\w* unprofitable \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, walketh \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H1980"\w* \w perverse|strong="H6143"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*,

\w He|strong="H7272"\w* winketh \w with|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H5869"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, presseth \w with|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H5869"\w* \w foot|strong="H7272"\w*, speaketh \w with|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H5869"\w* \w finger|strong="H0676"\w*.

\w With|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H7971"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w he|strong="H7971"\w* deviseth \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w at|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w times|strong="H6256"\w* \w he|strong="H7971"\w* soweth \w discord|strong="H4090"\w*.

\w To|strong="H0935"\w* \w such|strong="H3651"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w one|strong="H0369"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w destruction|strong="H0343"\w* \w shall|strong="H0369"\w* presently \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H0369"\w* \w suddenly|strong="H6597"\w* \w be|strong="H0369"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H0369"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w shall|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w longer|strong="H0369"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w any|strong="H0369"\w* \w remedy|strong="H4832"\w*.

\w Six|strong="H8337"\w* \w things|strong="H8441"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w*, which \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hateth, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7651"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* detesteth:

\w Haughty|strong="H7311"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w a|strong="H7311"\w* \w lying|strong="H8267"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*, \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w that|strong="H5869"\w* \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*,

\w A|strong="H7272"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w that|strong="H3820"\w* deviseth \w wicked|strong="H0205"\w* \w plots|strong="H4284"\w*, \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w that|strong="H3820"\w* \w are|strong="H4284"\w* \w swift|strong="H4116"\w* \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w run|strong="H7323"\w* into mischief,

\w A|strong="H7971"\w* \w deceitful|strong="H8267"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* \w that|strong="H7971"\w* uttereth \w lies|strong="H8267"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w that|strong="H7971"\w* soweth \w discord|strong="H4090"\w* \w among|strong="H0996"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*.

\w My|strong="H5341"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, beep \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w forsake|strong="H5203"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*.

\w Bind|strong="H7194"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*, \w and|strong="H3820"\w* put \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w neck|strong="H1621"\w*.

\w When|strong="H1980"\w* thou walkest, \w let|strong="H1980"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* thee: \w when|strong="H1980"\w* thou sleepest, \w let|strong="H1980"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* thee; \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w when|strong="H1980"\w* thou awakest, \w talk|strong="H7878"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* \w is|strong="H1870"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w lamp|strong="H5216"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* reproofs \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w* \w are|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w*:

\w That|strong="H3956"\w* \w they|strong="H7451"\w* may \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* thee \w from|strong="H0802"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, \w and|strong="H0802"\w* \w from|strong="H0802"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w flattering|strong="H2513"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \w of|strong="H0802"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w stranger|strong="H5237"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w covet|strong="H2530"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w beauty|strong="H3308"\w*, \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w caught|strong="H3947"\w* \w with|strong="H3947"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* winks:

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* price \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w* \w is|strong="H0376"\w* scarce \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w loaf|strong="H3603"\w*: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* catcheth \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w precious|strong="H3368"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*.

\w Can|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* hide \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w burn|strong="H8313"\w*?

\w Or|strong="H0518"\w* \w can|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w hot|strong="H1513"\w* \w coals|strong="H1513"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* burnt?

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* goeth \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* neighbour’s \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* clean \w when|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* fault \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w* great \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H5315"\w* hath \w stolen|strong="H1589"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* stealeth \w to|strong="H5315"\w* \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w hungry|strong="H7456"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*:

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* if \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H1004"\w* \w taken|strong="H4672"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* restore \w sevenfold|strong="H7659"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w substance|strong="H1952"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3820"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* an \w adulterer|strong="H5003"\w*, \w for|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H7843"\w* folly \w of|strong="H0802"\w* \w his|strong="H1931"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \w his|strong="H1931"\w* \w own|strong="H5315"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*:

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* gathereth \w to|strong="H3808"\w* \w himself|strong="H3808"\w* \w shame|strong="H7036"\w* \w and|strong="H2781"\w* dishonour, \w and|strong="H2781"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* blotted \w out|strong="H4672"\w*:

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w rage|strong="H2534"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* husband \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w spare|strong="H2550"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w revenge|strong="H5359"\w*,

\w Nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w yield|strong="H0014"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* man’s prayers, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w accept|strong="H0014"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* satisfaction \w ever|strong="H5375"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w many|strong="H7235"\w* \w gifts|strong="H7810"\w*.
